attributes.action: Support Barbers/Salons facing financial difficulty due to the lack of customers
attributes.additional_details: We know people are scared to come into barbers or salons but we have all follow the guidelines given & want the government to make the public see it is OK to come in to the local barbers or salons. Just like how it is OK for people to go back to restaurants, it is OK for them to get a treatment. We need help & support of the government to get our customers back. We require the same support as restaurants, we the barbers and salons are huge part of small businesses in the local communities.
attributes.background: We want help from the government as despite being happy to go back to work, there are no customers coming in. The huge decrease in customers make its difficult to pay for the ongoing rent and bills of the business. We need to help and we need all voices to be heard.
